subject: Ski Jumping
lead_paragraph: Thomas Morgenstern of Austria won the first World Cup individual ski jump of the season at the large hill event in Kuusamo, Finland, setting a hill with his opening-round jump of 146.5 meters. He then hit 137 in the final round for a total of 308.8 points.
